summary: Adds one small cave across from the graveyard at Refugee\'s Rest. (East border of the map)
descriptionHtml:
Adds one icy cavern to the game across from the refugee\'s rest graveyard. The dungeon is recommended for higher level characters because the hostiles I put in are higher tier. It has a completed navmesh, details, lighting and I also cleaned up the navmesh around the entrance. 

Note to other modders: If you make a dungeon be sure to check the navmesh outside your dungeon too, after I ran it without checking I had wolves running over the top of the cave entrance but they shouldn\'t anymore. I just wanted to mention this because the tutorial I used did not.

I made this while learning the basics of dungeon creation instead of using the same kits as the tutorial. I hope someone enjoys it!

Known Issues:
May Conflict with Riverwood Tower - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9111
author: Sigrosa
